author: Hartmann, Johannes
title: Officina sanitatis sive praxis chymiatrica plane aurea. Antehac a Johanne Hartmanno ... conscripta, et a clariss. d.d. Johanne Michaelis ac Georgio Everharto Hartmanno ... facta ... Nunc vero indefesso labore ... revindicata, nec non ... locupletata a Joh
imprint: "Noribergae: sumptibus Wolfgangi Mauritii Endteri, & Johannis Andreae Endteri haeredum, 1677"
